spec_data.Name: perl-AuthCAS
spec_data.Description:
AuthCAS aims at providing a Perl API to Yale's Central Authentication
System (CAS). Only a basic Perl library is provided with CAS whereas
AuthCAS is a full object-oriented library.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 07:01:01 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Client library for CAS 2.0 authentication server
